label: 五山
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Following the custom of Southern Sung China, which assigned official status to five leading Rinzai-sect Zen temples, temples in Kamakura City began to be so designated in the late thirteenth century. After the fall of the Kamakura Bakufu, Kyoto Zen temples were honored in the same way.　[臨済宗]
